channel.title: I need help
channel.description:
the error is
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.appendHitToPlayer(client.java:518) at client.process(client.java:11458) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:138) at server.main(server.java:49)
on the first one in client.java on line 518 you see this
if (server.playerHandler.players[index].walkdelay <= 0
here is the public void name
public void appendHitToPlayer(int index, int hitDiff, boolean stillSpell) //Used for MagicHandler
and in client.java on line 11458 this is what you find
if (castSpell2)
its part of
public boolean process() {
and on playerhandler.java on line 138
while(players[i].process() && players[i] != null);
and its part off
public void process() {
and on server.java on line 49 you see
playerHandler.process(); // updates all player related stuff[br][size=1]Posted on: October 12, 2007, 06:09:18 PM[/size][hr]i think its
public void appendHitToPlayer(int index, int hitDiff, boolean stillSpell) //Used for MagicHandler
But idk what to do
Help plz

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @fernando400 fernando400
item.description:
@fernando400 wrote:

a } wouldnt cause that, i wouldnt be even able to compile
I can run server and play, but sometimes it happens that and crash time, its not every time
just sometimes
Yashua had same problem
